page.title: 06A NOTTINGHAM PRISON OFFICER
page.content: We went to Nottingham Prison to talk to Mr Martingell,a Prison Officer,who has been in the service for 30yrs.He likes working in Nottingham because it is a nice,comfortable and quiet prison He gets up at 5.00am.and comes off duty at 8.30pm.He tries to train the prisoners to behave themselves.The Officers try to work on a personality basis rather than a show of force.He has occasionally been assaulted and has felt angry at the time,but only later has he worried and realised what might have happened.In his 11yrs at Nottingham he has noticed that the degree of crime,especially violent, among the prisoners,has become steadily worse.He thought this trend would continue unless something could be done to make people see the need to respect each other and each other's views.
